'''Cave vines''' are a [[feature]] that consists of [[glow berries]], found in the [[lush caves]] biome. Players can use these to climb up and down. They have the same function as [[weeping vines]].

== Generation ==
Cave vines generate as a block column hanging from the ceiling of caves. Their height varies between 1 and 20 blocks.

=== Config ===

{{main|Configured feature}}
{{el|java}}:
<section begin="config"/><div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound|config}}
** {{nbt|string|direction}} The direction of the column. One of <code>up</code>, <code>down</code>, <code>north</code>, <code>east</code>, <code>south</code>, or <code>west</code>.
** {{nbt|compound|allowed_placement}} A [[block predicate]] that must be passed for each position of the column.
*** {{list indent|*|{{#lst:block predicate|json format}}}}
** {{nbt|boolean|prioritize_tip}} Determines where to cut off blocks when space is restricted. If <code>true</code>, starts removing layers from the start of the column.
** {{nbt|list|layers}} (Required, but can be empty) The layers of this column.
*** {{nbt|compound}} A layer.
**** {{nbt|int}}{{nbt|compound|height}} Specifying the height of the layer. Must be a non-negative int.
***** {{nbt inherit/int_provider}}
**** {{nbt|compound|provider}} The block to use for this layer.
***** {{nbt inherit/block_state_provider}}
</div><section end="config"/>

{{Collapse|title=An example|head=1}}
<syntaxhighlight lang="json">
{
  "type": "minecraft:block_column",
  "config": {
    "direction": "down",
    "allowed_placement": {
      "type": "minecraft:matching_blocks",
      "blocks": "minecraft:air"
    },
    "prioritize_tip": true,
    "layers": [
      {
        "height": {
          "type": "minecraft:uniform",
          "value": {
            "min_inclusive": 2,
            "max_inclusive": 5
          }
        },
        "provider": {
          "type": "minecraft:simple_state_provider",
          "state": {
            "Name": "minecraft:cave_vines_plant"
          }
        }
      },
      {
        "height": 1,
        "provider": {
          "type": "minecraft:simple_state_provider",
          "state": {
            "Name": "minecraft:cave_vines"
          }
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}
</syntaxhighlight>
